channel.description: Secure your Okta API authentication with JWTs Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Build a JWT for Client Authentication: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/build-self-signed-jwt/java/main/ Page type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.
